page.title: 04FARMING IN BURNHAM MARKET 3
page.content:
{ Farm Animals}
Farming in this survey area is mainly arable, and farm animals do not play a large part. There are no dairy herds (just one house cow at Gallow Hill farm). There are seven beef cattle at Gallow Hill Farm. Westgate Farm has 1000 pigs and Muckleton has 400. Sheep from nearby farms are grazed at Muckleton in the summer months. Gallow Hill Farm has twelve chickens for domestic use and Westmead has two. Gallow Hill Farm has a Suffolk Punch mare which is used on the farm and which has won several prizes at local shows. Muckleton Farm has four racehorses and two ponies. The racehorses are trained on the farm and have won many prizes at nearby Fakenham racecourse
